name: Affoe the Heart attack game
description:
You play as a red blood cell inside a human body. You have 10 heartbeats to prevent the heart from dying. If you use all 10 heartbeats, you will respawn to the start and your heartbeats reset. Try to find a way to finish all quests in the 10 heartbeat limit.

 Made by:

 Emma van den Broek

Inèz Hemme

Jakub Stachurski
